bs-installer-title:
Headline of installer
*$1 is the version of MediaWiki which will be installed
*$2 is the version of BlueSpice which will be installed
bs-installer-could-not-rename:
Error message that one or more elements could not be renamed and that it should be done manually.
*$1 is the number of elements that could not be renamed - use for PLURAL distinction
*$2 is a comma seperated list of elements which could not be renamed
